thread.title: BRIEF-Galantas Gold Corp ‍Announces Date Change For Third Party Appeal Against Positive Judicial Review Of Planning Consent​

title: BRIEF-Galantas Gold Corp ‍Announces Date Change For Third Party Appeal Against Positive Judicial Review Of Planning Consent​

organizations.name: third party appeal against positive judicial review of planning consent​ february
third party appeal against positive judicial review of planning consent​ reuters

text:
February 6, 2018 / 7:38 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Galantas Gold Corp ‍Announces Date Change For Third Party Appeal Against Positive Judicial Review Of Planning Consent​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Galantas Gold Corp: 
* ANNOUNCES A DATE CHANGE FOR THIRD PARTY APPEAL AGAINST A POSITIVE JUDICIAL REVIEW OF ITS PLANNING CONSENT​ 
* ‍DUE TO ILLNESS OF THIRD PARTY, WHO IS A LITIGANT IN PERSON, DATE OF HEARING OF APPEAL HAS BEEN POSTPONED UNTIL FEBRUARY 15, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
